name: EventCustom
description: This event allows you to create and trigger your own custom events with custom data.
overview: Allows creation of user-defined events with custom data. Can store various data types (int, string, double, boolean, objects). Events can be triggered manually using `trigger()` or `triggerAsync()`. Custom events can be registered to appear in the GUI. Supports both synchronous and asynchronous triggering.

constructors.description: Creates a new custom event with a specified name.

parameters.name: eventName
parameters.description: The name of the custom event.

methods.name: trigger
methods.description: Triggers the event and executes all registered listeners.

methods.name: triggerAsync
methods.description: Triggers the event asynchronously and runs a callback after completion.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Function to run after all listeners finish

methods.name: putInt
methods.description: Stores an integer value in the event data.

methods.name: putString
methods.description: Stores a string value in the event data.
examples:
const customEvent = new EventCustom("MyCustomEvent");
customEvent.putString("message", "Hello from custom event!");

methods.name: putDouble
methods.description: Stores a double value in the event data.

methods.name: putBoolean
methods.description: Stores a boolean value in the event data.

methods.name: putObject
methods.description: Stores any object value in the event data.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Returns the type of data stored under the given name.

methods.name: getInt
methods.description: Retrieves an integer value from the event data.

methods.name: getString
methods.description: Retrieves a string value from the event data.

methods.name: getDouble
methods.description: Retrieves a double value from the event data.

methods.name: getBoolean
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean value from the event data.

methods.name: getObject
methods.description: Retrieves an object value from the event data.

methods.name: getUnderlyingMap
methods.description: Returns the underlying map that stores the event data.

methods.name: registerEvent
methods.description: Registers this custom event so it appears in the GUI.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.
